Received my order, DPEX packaging is terrible. They used a very strong adhesive for the food vouchers which ultimately will ruin the kitty's plastic bag packaging and it also didn't have an extra plastic packaging over the whole item (See photos). I preferred the SingPost method of packaging which was previously done for the Bubbly World. Why you guys don't use SingPost instead this time round? Are you not aware that some collectors wants to keep it in prestine condition?
I thought the kitty plushie is not available via mcdelivery as stated in website ?
Why is my order taking so long to reach when it says is out for delivery? Can someone give me a answer on this? I tried calling the dpex customer for times but there is no avail to it.

I think you should stop using DPEX. Honestly, it is only reasonable to expect a delivery time frame, even if its for one whole day or even two! I think people would be willing to wait at home for this special package but Dpex does not even give a reasonable time frame - a few days of waiting time is not reasonable. No phone calls, no pre warnings. I received my Hello Kitty. The man called when he was OUTSIDE my door. I was not home and he SMSed a minute later to say that it was with a neighbour. The box was squashed very badly, not sure if its by the despatch or the neighbour. I do not wish to pursue this further as I believe despatch deliverers are at the bottom of the feeding chain and are doing their very best. Perhaps next time, pick a company that is able to handle such a large volume of deliveries or at least a company who is willing to hire more despatch personnel to do the job reasonably well. Remember your reputation is linked closely to your partners.

comments.message: MY fond memories Mcdonalds: From missing chicken nuggets, half filled fries to dead housefly in fries.... This time special order of "add cheese"- invisible cheese. Only from RWS McDonalds.
Nacho without nacho cheese sauce from the grill slip . And the burger really got no nacho worst NO Twister , called their outlet no one answer - sun plaza 👍

19.01.2015

It was a monday night, at approximately 11pm. I have been working the whole day, after which I made a wild goose chase all over Singapore to meet her. 

Finally, I am able to grab hold of my dream girl. I was ready to confess, at just any void deck.

She insisted on having ice Milo from Macs and we walked to the nearest branch at Pionner Mall. 

I grabbed her hands and wanted to ask her to go steady. She was as nervous as I am, and she pushed me to buy her milo first before anything. As I queued to buy, the timing couldn't be any better. There is a Line promotion where they were selling the Line Bear, and just nice, it was Brown with the "I love you" message. 

I bought it instantly with a nugget set and returned to the table, this time bent on making it succeed as she gets her Milo and there is no other reason she can push me away anymore.

On the night of 19th January 2015, 11.45pm, I asked her to be my first girlfriend ever, and she said yes. At Pioneer Mall Mcdonalds, laughing like hyenas. 

@Chew S. Hui, i love you.

Wanna share my experience with all people and mcd. Went to Mcd Admiralty just now and ordered filet meal. After finished my favourite fries, found out that my filet was wrongly delivered, ordered extra sauce but came out no sauce. Went back to the counter to informed the manager, she took my cold filet burger and passed to the kitchen, within a min, i got back my filet burger with sauce. However, after i went back to my table and found out that it was the same cold burger that i gave her. Thought mcd have a policy of replacing a new item regardless of how much time the item was delivered?
Next, I called up the mcd hotline to feedback about this issue and clarified with the call centre staff on mcd policies which was told that that is true, they should change a new fresh item regardless of time once the item is out. But after the feedback, the call centre management did was asked the stall manager to call me back and checked with me on this issue, which the same manager who assisted me and she said, she have replaced the filet burger for me when i approached her just now but she did not know that it was the same cold burger that i handed over to her.

Additional, the other past experiences that i had in the same stall, i approached the staff at the counter to informed them i ordered a up-size meal but the fries that they gave me was a Large fries packet but medium or small size fries quantity. For this, they replaced me a new fries but the quantity is still the same "medium or small amount", which is not the value that i paid for. (This has been feedback many times for the past 1 years plus but no changes had been made)

Hi i would like to make a complain at one of the malay delivery guy, order number  AM10-08/08/2015-111546. I will like an explanation that why there was no napkin or straws or any condiment (curry sauce, the only reason why i even order mcnuggets) with the food i order? When i called to question the driver as he just left, he started conversing in malay. I told him there wasn't any of the above mention, he simply just replied "apa apa ya la ya la" and hanged up my call. i was amazed at how much effort your Ang Mo Kio franchisee puts into service or anything at all. Disgusting.

We waited more than an hour for our Mcdelivery. We called the oulet at Hougang and they told us the order has been delayed due to the rain. I think it is a basic customer service to call and inform us about the delay instead of keeping us waiting. We have to make several calls and finally got connected to the outlet. I think such service is unacceptable coming from Mcdonalds. Now the manager is telling us we have to wait another 20-30 minutes for our food again. So much waiting is dampening our mood.

Fondest moments, buying a meal to share with my wife but can't eat at McD because they are not bothered to chase out the students freeloading off the free aircond after buying 1 stupid meal each and sitting there taking up space for hours.. Happened in many McD outlets.. talking about great customer service summore?

No fond memories for me, only more & more bad experiences from Mac. 

The delivery outlet simply cancel my advanced order because they cannot deliver at my requested timing at 8.45am & insisted I waited till 9.30am for my order to arrive when my colleagues are leaving office by 9.15am.

& also your delivery outlet ONLY CALLED TO INFORM me at 8.40am that they cannot do the delivery when the requested delivery time is 8.45am!!!

Best part is, I have paid fully for my online advanced order & when I request for a refund, I was told I'll only get my money back in 7 days time!!!

Damn "Great"  customer service indeed!!!

Hi Mcdonald's, may I ask if your restaurants changes the cookIng oil everyday? I heard from one of your employee that the oil is filtered and then reused for a few days... I think this is not good for consumers health. Kindly clarify. Thank you.
Please do smth about ur mcdelivery. 5 days straight I can't make orders due to pending orders. One night I can call 3 time in 2 hours.

Wanna clarify my curiosity , why is there hidden/extra charges On all the food items when we order online when there is already a delivery charges? I don't get it that why we pay for delivery charges yet we still have to pay extra for all the things we ordered. For example, apple pie sold in store only cost $1 and yet order online cost $1.45. 
Can you clarify why do we need to pay extra through online ordering? Is it packing and delivery needed to cost more than $3.50? If not why? Depends on what I order, I could get the hidden/extra charge and delivery charge up to $5. Can you please explain and answer to my curiosity?!

Just want to share my bad experience with MACDONLADS yesterday!! We ordered online 3 big breakfast deluxe with hot milo,cold milo and orange juice but end up with wrong delivery..MACDONLADS delivered to us hot coffee Instead of hot Milo !!! And no straw given for hot milo..They did not even give us any cutlery Too !!! Wth ? This is not the first time ! It happen to my family several times. Come on we are paying, why such a bad service ! !! Really feeling fed up with  MACDONALDS !!!

I remembered I first step into orchard McDonald with my mum in 1981. During that time, my mum was an uneducated woman, she did not know English and hence didn't know how to order hamburger for me. At that time I was only nine years old, I pestered her to buy a hamburger for me. Due to her love in me, she brought up her courage to walk to the counter to place an order despites having fear that she will embarrass herself for not knowing how to order. She finally managed to buy a hamburger for me and I knew that seeing me eating the hamburger made her feel happy cuz she knew it's my first time eating in McDonald. She just passed away last month and I just feel that she was such a great mother. Come to think of it, it was one of the best memorable and fond moment that I spend my time in McDonald with my dearest mum. 😘💕Mum I love you, because of you I know McDonald and have my very first bite on hamburger. I love McDonald too. Because of McDonald, I knew that my mum loved me.
https://youtu.be/jH_k17Tk9A8 Nassn Dances at Mcdonald's Amk. Fondest moment? Fabulous Music to go with Nassn's favourite Mcdonald's meal. ☺
Nassn's fondest moments happen only at Mcdonalds when he savours his favourite ice-cream with fries hehehe@Mcdonalds Amk Hub

My Fondest Moment at Mcdonald's on and around Aug 2005 when I was heavily preganant with my first child. Seeing the huge crowd of customers infront of me, I was so Pleasantly surprised when I got the so called 'Priority Queue' when the Bedok Princess McDonald came to me & sweetly asked for my order & helped me to the queue. I literally paid her a $10 & she delivered the hot piping food to me at my table together with my change ! What a Fond Gesture & Moment I received from McDonald's & this will always be my Best Fondest Memory at McDonald's ! Cheers !

My son celebrated his first birthday party at MacDonald's@Serene Centre in 1986. Many of his cousins aged 3 years and above did enjoy the games session very much.  It was really a happy and memorable moment for us, first time parents.

I got to know this guy from an online chatroom. We have been 'friends' for about a year before we finally decided to meet up. In early July 2003, it was our 1st date!

Didnt really had a plan where to go, we decided to run my personal errand and have dinner. McDonalds Clementi (under the old cinema opp the famous Clementi Central fountain) was our choice. We sat at the so called alfresco seats. It was just the granite made picnic benches afterall. Couldnt recall wat we actually ate that day but surely I remember how he keep going to the gents, nervous maybe hehehe. And so there were many more MacDonalds lunches and dinners to come thereafter. We had many discussions, plannings and sharings there. And on 2005 we got married. Earie Ahmad was 'this guy' that I have choosen to spend the rest of my life with. 

However... the same MacDonalds is now gone. The old cinema was torn down and now replaced with City Vibes. Theres 2 MacDonalds now in Clementi Central. One in Clementi Mall and another below the polyclinic. It will never be same again tho and we don't even have a picture of the former MacDonalds. No matter what, it will be forever in our memory. Now we have been married almost 10 years and more of the 10s years to come till death do us part. 

Thank you MacDonalds! You may not be the best fastfood chain but you surely are our favourite and part of #Arida's life journey...

I've grown up literally eating mcdonalds every day since young..probably at the age of primary 1? Or kindergarden even.

Im not one who love to eat rice,even at my current age of 27.. neither is macdonalds a cheap meal to be consumed back in the 1990s.

My most fond memory is the period when my dad who is illiterate made an effort to go down to the nearest mcdonalds at bukit gombak, point to the cashier auntie set no.3 and place an order & bringing back to the home for me to consume. Its a daily affair that my dad did for me.

Nothing can replace the ♡ and effort that my dad take to buy and save just to let me enjoy my mcdonalds. The fondest moment of my lifetime.

My fondest moment was when McDonald  opened its first outlet in Singapore at Liat Towers in October 1979. On its opening day, the outlet set a record for the world's highest number of burgers served.I was 25 years old then and was proud to be part of this history as I was there too and it would be equally memorable if I can win this "Share your fond moments in McDonald's"

Way back in 1986, at Bedok Macdonald, where the higher level used to be Princess and Raja cinema, my mother brought my siblings and I to a fancy dress competition organize by Bedok Macdonald. There were also lucky draw and a magic show by Ronald MacDonald. As a child back then, I always look forward to my mum bringing us to Macdonald. Back then, Macdonald was an expensive treat from mum cause we were not from the less well off family.

Mac is not just a homonym of Ma (Mother or Mum) but is synonymous with it.Hence the moment when my one year old baby girl knew how to utter those words when we stepped into Mcdonald's six years ago,remains fond moments for us (parents) even till today.

My fondest moment was when my 3 best friends and I hadn't seen each other for years and we could only meet each other for only 30minutes. We decided to stake out in McDonalds and laugh over memories, sundaes and Happy Meals, then take pictures in the beautiful ambience. I haven't seen them all together since, but if I win this voucher, it shouldn't be too difficult to guess where I am planning our next gathering!:)
Why is my address out of Mcdonald's deliever area? McDonald's please explain
My fondest moment at Mcdonald's is when I ordered my first double McSpicy Burger, it was so big, so delicious! The best food from you! Order it at least 5 times a month!

8.post_text:
What’s your fond moment in McDonald’s?

Was it a first date, studying for exams with your buddies or an awesome birthday party? Share your favourite moment with us in a photo or written text submission by replying directly to the comments section of this post. The top 50 moments will each win a $50 Create Your Taste voucher! Contest ends 14 August. 

Visit https://goo.gl/zNNonj for Terms & Conditions.

comments.message: Dear McDonald's. Your Hello Kitty delivery is the worst. Not only did it take days for the items to reach me (my friends received theirs way earlier on 28 July). Your courier came at 9.15pm on 1 Aug but I was in the toilet. Through text messages, the delivery person told me that it will need to be redelivered, but if I want, I could pick it up at the next block across the road myself as he was delivering there. I asked whether he could make an exception and come back to my blk since it's so near and he said no. This is not right.. how can you make a customer pick up the item himself/herself as it should be part of the service. Moreover, it's literally just the next block, why couldn't an exception be made? This is really terrible terrible service, after making me wait so many days as well as the whole entire evening.
Anyone know are they selling the weekly hk at 11am ??

Terrible delivery services, waited for so many days, today appear suddenly in front of my door when I was outside joining SG50 celebrations. Called me and said i have to choose either to leave the hello kitty outside my door or deliver them again during day time next week. What kind of choice is that? Worse then Singpost!!!
Hi, we have placed order for the collectible sg50 kitty set. What happen if they delivered and we are not at home.
hi, i'm ordered on Day 1, Jul 20 and received confirmation at 11.07am, but until now still no sound no picture. So how are you dispatching the order? ordered day1 but received last?

Wanna share my experience with all people and mcd. Went to Mcd Admiralty just now and ordered filet meal. After finished my favourite fries, found out that my filet was wrongly delivered, ordered extra sauce but came out no sauce. Went back to the counter to informed the manager, she took my cold filet burger and passed to the kitchen, within a min, i got back my filet burger with sauce. However, after i went back to my table and found out that it was the same cold burger that i gave her. Thought mcd have a policy of replacing a new item regardless of how much time the item was delivered?
Next, I called up the mcd hotline to feedback about this issue and clarified with the call centre staff on mcd policies which was told that that is true, they should change a new fresh item regardless of time once the item is out. But after the feedback, the call centre management did was asked the stall manager to call me back and checked with me on this issue, which the same manager who assisted me and she said, she have replaced the filet burger for me when i approached her just now but she did not know that it was the same cold burger that i handed over to her.

Additional, the other past experiences that i had in the same stall, i approached the staff at the counter to informed them i ordered a up-size meal but the fries that they gave me was a Large fries packet but medium or small size fries quantity. For this, they replaced me a new fries but the quantity is still the same "medium or small amount", which is not the value that i paid for. (This has been feedback many times for the past 1 years plus but no changes had been made)
My breakfast deluxe with no meat😡 disappointed😔

15.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0300 hours to 0600 hours on 22 Jul 2015. 24.post_text: Guess who's sneaking a peek at you! Arriving soon, on 20th July.
